ComicInfo.Summary: Aboard the Siovansin, Sere and Niniri drug Jason in an attempt to interrogate him. Jason collapses and is declared dead. In Avalon, Galahad, Percival and Lancelot prepare to guard the mysterious Gates. On Earth, Liana and Brent find Galahad wounded in an alley way. They take him to Chris for medical attention. Brent,Chris,Galahad and Liana are confronted by two guards from the Institute who attempt to recapture Liana.
ComicInfo.Characters: Lancelot,Sere,Brent Donewitz,Sir Galahad,Percival,Niniri,Jason Scott,Christopher D'Errico, Liana,Antonio Minetti
